text: Goodou mmada gi God i dana haga manawa gee godou lodo. Dana haga manawa gee goodou, guu hai goodou gi manawa maaloo, manawa hagamahi bolo goodou gi madammaa. Goodou gu lodo huaidu gi di mee huaidu, goodou gu haga lligalliga, goodou gu hidihidi, goodou gu maanadu mai au, gei goodou gu togomaalia e hagaduadua digau ala e hai di huaidu. Goodou gu haga modongoohia aga bolo goodou guu hai nia mee huogodoo ala e hai nia mee gii donu.
